snippet.title: Deep End | Devs Play, Gameplay | Floatlands: Dev Stream #05 pt.2
snippet.description:
We continue with the 2nd part of the Development Stream, the Gameplay.
Ever wonder, how good are the developers at playing their own game? We've done just that, you'll have the chance to watch Devs Play. Andrej, Floatlands Game 3D generalist will showcase the essence of the Floatlands and try not to die doing it. But will he make it? 

He'll start by gathering resources used for crafting simple tools. Soon after, he'll take off with a helicopter and explore different islands, continue to build a home in which he'll show basics of the electrical system used in the game and end spectaculary with a ambush fight against NPCs.

This version of the Floatlands Game was constructed for EGX Rezzed 2017 and will be heavily updated during the development process.


For more bonus content, join our Discord channel!
https://discord.gg/floatlands 

More:
Dev-Blog................. http://floatlands.net
Instagram............... http://instagram.com/floatlands
Twitter..................... http://twitter.com/Floatlands
Facebook................ http://facebook.com/Floatlands
Twitch..................... http://twitch.tv/floatlands


~ CREDITS ~
Game Studio:                                  6Pills Games
Game Engine:                                  Unity

3D Artist/Generalist:                      Andrej Krebs
2D Artist & Graphics Designer:    Mito Madjar Horvat
Composer:                                      Chris Plexidas
